headline: Las Vegas Sands: Xi Jinping's Macau Visit Removes Long-Time Bearish Take On Stock
summary: I'm bullish on Las Vegas Sands due to strong performance despite investor distrust in Asian operations. Read an analysis of LVS stock here.
